arts.ttl: 'It looks very, very bad' - Valakari sinking with St Johnstone
arts.sum: Eight points adrift. Eight games without a win. Three goals conceded inside 22 minutes against Dundee. Things aren't pretty for St Johnstone, writes Amy Canavan.
